/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. Buildings of different sizes and shapes flank the street, their facades painted in a palette of mostly beige and gray, reflecting the architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
